definitions: A fictional universe or setting where heroes, often with extraordinary abilities, undertake quests, battle villains, and shape the destiny of their world.
A genre of fantasy or adventure literature, film, or games that focuses on the exploits of heroic characters within a distinct, often magical, world.
examples: The hero realm was filled with ancient prophecies and powerful artifacts.
Many players enjoyed exploring the vast hero realm in the new game.
She immersed herself in stories set in a classic hero realm.
